Script to map the distribution of tree growth. Krigging.

#### Reading Data
```{r Reading data and , eval=TRUE, message=FALSE}

#======================================================================================

#Set working directory
if (Sys.info()['sysname'] == 'Windows'){
  setwd("C:/Users/Sebastian/Google Drive/Urban")
} else if (Sys.info()['sysname'] == 'Linux'){
  setwd("~/Google Drive/Urban")
}

# reading data
plots <- read.csv('Data/Plots.csv')

hist(plots$Biomass.02.14)
summary(plots$Biomass.02.14)

a <- cbind(plots$GPS.Coordinate..X.,
           plots$GPS.Coordinate..Y.,
           plots$Biomass.02.14)
range(a[,1])

n <- as.geodata(a)

x.range <- range(a[,1])
y.range <- range(a[,2])

x = seq(from=x.range[1], to=x.range[2], by=1)
y = seq(from=y.range[1], to=y.range[2], by=1)
length(x)
length(y)
xv <- rep(x,length(y))
yv <- rep(y, each=length(x))
in_mat <- as.matrix(cbind(xv,yv))
plot(in_mat)



```
